original_title: Nixpu Pima - Rito de Passagem Huni Kuin
overview: Encouraged by her father, PÃ£teani Huni Kuin becomes the first filmmaker of her tribe. She records her family's daily routine and interviews her elders during the planning of a traditional Huni Kuin initiation rite.
title: Nixpu Pima - Rito de Passagem Huni Kuin
